name: Radiation Collector
description:
You are a little creature born from Radiation who is searching for Rad!

Collect all the pieces of Radiation that are scattered around the map and complete the level while Groundpounding your way to get it!

Note: Most of objects and buttons are used with the Groundpound move and/or smashing them with it.

PD: I recommend the updated version, it improves most of aspects of the game, but you can try the jam edition too.

Controls:

Restart level: R

Movement: A & D / Left & Right keys.

Jump: W / Up key.

GroundPound: Press S / Down key in midair.

Save game:  Press Control (ctrl) near a 'Blue barrel'  to save your progress!
